list_definition.definition: the line of linked bones running down the back of humans and many animals; backbone

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: She damaged her spine when she fell.

list_definition.definition: something like a backbone in shape or function
a thin, stiff, pointed part growing on an animal or a plant.
